description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Range 60 feet; Area @Template[type:burst|distance:15]

Your prayer wraps you and your allies in a layer of angelic protection. You and your allies within the Limit Break’s area of effect gain the Seraph’s Flight condition with a value equal to your limit rank, for a duration of 1 round per Limit Rank.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feat-effects.Item.gYQ9dCH0uBquKO5A]{Effect: Seraph's Flight}

Special You can use other limit breaks even while under the effects of the Seraph's Flight condition, despite the Limit Break action specifying otherwise.
